name: Panic Reload
description:
Panic Reload is a game made in Game Maker for the #GMTKJam2020 made in 48 hours. 

Stay inside the areas without enemies for 60 seconds and you'll win the game, your gun is totally out of control and every time you reload a little surprise awaits you. Be careful and good luck agent Derp.

Made by:

Xavi Morales - @CHUMASQUITO (Programer)

Samuel Nuez Molina - @samuelnuez00 (Character Artist and Sound Designer)

Adrià Paüls - @adri12354 (Tester)

Victor Rubio Maturana - @TheReal_LeGord (Enviroment Artist)

Estefania Taboada Bornes - @Saki00_Art (Enemy Artsit)

Joel Torrent Barrero - @_jowent (Programer)

External resources:

Music ----> Kilua Boy: Psycho Punch

Thanks for playing and HAVE FUN!
